notes: Could not reproduce the path intersection bug. Reporter used SkiaSharp 1.60.3 which only has x86_64 macOS natives (incompatible with arm64, Rosetta unavailable). Tested with SkiaSharp 2.88.9 and 3.119.2 — both correctly return 4 intersection points. Also confirmed working on main (source) via xUnit test. The bug was likely fixed in a subsequent Skia engine update between 1.60.3 and 2.88.9. Issue is labeled status/skia-update-required, suggesting the fix was expected to come from an upstream Skia update.

reproductionSteps.description: Create standalone console project and write reproduction code from issue #655
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet new console -n Repro --framework net8.0 && dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 1.60.3
reproductionSteps.output: Project created and package added successfully.

filesCreated.description: Reproduction code from issue #655 — creates two paths with near-zero coordinates and tests intersection

reproductionSteps.description: Skip SkiaSharp 1.60.3 — native library has no arm64 support and Rosetta unavailable
Run with SkiaSharp 2.88.9 plus NativeAssets.macOS on macOS arm64
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 2.88.9 && dotnet add package SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.macOS --version 2.88.9 && dotnet run
reproductionSteps.output:
SkiaSharp version: 2.88.0.0
Path A point count: 4
Path B point count: 4
Result point count: 4
Result bounds: {Left=0,Top=6,104E-06,Width=720,Height=540}
OK: Intersection produced points.

reproductionSteps.description: Run with latest SkiaSharp 3.119.2 on macOS arm64
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 3.119.2 && dotnet run
reproductionSteps.output:
SkiaSharp version: 3.119.0.0
Path A point count: 4
Path B point count: 4
Result point count: 4
Result bounds: {Left=0,Top=6,104E-06,Width=720,Height=540}
OK: Intersection produced points.

reproductionSteps.description: Test on main (source) using xUnit test infrastructure with temporary test method

versionResults.notes: Reporter's version. Only has i386/x86_64 macOS native — incompatible with arm64. Rosetta unavailable (dotnet is arm64-only). Nupkg inspection confirmed: runtimes/osx/native/libSkiaSharp.dylib contains only i386 and x86_64 slices.
Intersection returns 4 points correctly. Bug appears fixed.
Intersection returns 4 points correctly. Bug not present.
xUnit test PathOpIntersectWithNearZeroCoordinatesReturnsPoints passed — intersection returns points.
